tasks.task: Install and operate a solar-powered water pump for cattle watering.
subtasks: Assess the solar panel system's suitability for the location.
Ensure the solar panels receive adequate sun exposure.
Bury cables to route from the solar panels to the pump's location.
Position the pump at the desired elevation for water displacement.
Verify the water source's depth and quality.
Test the pump's capacity and functionality under operating conditions.

tasks.task: Maintain the solar-powered water system for agricultural use.
subtasks: Regularly check solar panels for debris and cleanliness.
Inspect cables and connections for damage or wear.
Monitor pump performance and address any malfunctions.
Adjust the system setup if necessary to optimize water delivery.

tasks.task: Promote the solar-powered water pump system to potential farmers.
subtasks: Share testimonials and success stories from satisfied customers.
Engage with interested customers via communication channels.
Present the benefits of solar-powered pumps over conventional systems.
Offer technical assistance and support for system inquiries.
